translations: 茴鱼，河鳟；鳟眼蝶，褐色蝶类

sentences.sentence: The trout and grayling had gone.
When she mentioned "AC Grayling" Ross replied: "Oh, I know her."
sentences.translation: 当她回答说是“AC·格雷林”时，罗斯接口就说：“噢，我认识她。”

sentences.sentence: Chris Grayling, shadow home secretary, said he had fears about the abuse of the data.
sentences.translation: 影子内政大臣Chris Grayling说，他担心数据会被滥用。
